title: Add five initial food items to database

requirements.text: Add Chicken Biryani food item to backend database with name 'Chicken Biryani', price ₹180, categories 'Lunch' and 'Non-Vegetarian', placeholder image URL, available status, and appropriate description and preparation time
acceptanceCriteria: Food item exists in backend with exact name 'Chicken Biryani'
Price is set to 180 (in rupees)
Item is tagged with both 'Lunch' and 'Non-Vegetarian' categories
Item has a valid imageUrl
Item is marked as available
Item has appropriate description and preparation time

requirements.text: Add Paneer Tikka food item to backend database with name 'Paneer Tikka', price ₹150, categories 'Dinner' and 'Vegetarian', placeholder image URL, available status, and appropriate description and preparation time
acceptanceCriteria: Food item exists in backend with exact name 'Paneer Tikka'
Price is set to 150 (in rupees)
Item is tagged with both 'Dinner' and 'Vegetarian' categories
Item has a valid imageUrl
Item is marked as available
Item has appropriate description and preparation time

requirements.text: Add Aloo Paratha food item to backend database with name 'Aloo Paratha', price ₹80, categories 'Breakfast' and 'Vegetarian', placeholder image URL, available status, and appropriate description and preparation time
acceptanceCriteria: Food item exists in backend with exact name 'Aloo Paratha'

Item is tagged with both 'Breakfast' and 'Vegetarian' categories
Item has a valid imageUrl
Item is marked as available
Item has appropriate description and preparation time

requirements.text: Add Matar Paneer Roti food item to backend database with name 'Matar Paneer Roti', price ₹200, categories 'Dinner', 'Lunch', and 'Vegetarian', placeholder image URL, available status, and appropriate description and preparation time

quotes: Matar Paneer Roti - ₹200 - Dinner or Lunch/Vegetarian

acceptanceCriteria: Food item exists in backend with exact name 'Matar Paneer Roti'
Price is set to 200 (in rupees)
Item is tagged with 'Dinner', 'Lunch', and 'Vegetarian' categories
Item has a valid imageUrl
Item is marked as available
Item has appropriate description and preparation time

constraints: Maintain existing backend schema for food items
Use placeholder image URLs consistent with existing patterns in the codebase
Preserve all existing food items in the database
nonGoals: Adding new categories beyond those already defined

required: Appetizing photo of Chicken Biryani in a traditional serving bowl with garnish (chicken-biryani.dim_400x300.png)
Appetizing photo of Paneer Tikka skewers with charred edges and garnish (paneer-tikka.dim_400x300.png)
Appetizing photo of Aloo Paratha on a plate with butter and yogurt side (aloo-paratha.dim_400x300.png)
Appetizing photo of Matar Paneer curry in a traditional bowl with garnish (matar-paneer.dim_400x300.png)
Appetizing photo of Matar Paneer Roti combination plate with curry and roti (matar-paneer-roti.dim_400x300.png)
